item.description:
Memorial Day Parade - May 25th 10 a.m. Jump on board the Jaycee float to promote the chapter and Wapping Fair. We are meeting at the float at 9 a.m. to start decorating. The parade is over by 11 a.m. Our float starts off on Connecticut Ave. From RTE 5, turn onto South Satellie Road and then take a left onto Connecticut Ave

Your children are welcome to ride the float. We will have bags of candy to throw out to the spectators along the parade route.
item.how_to_find_us: decorated a truck and trailer-Jaycee banner-Wapping fair banner
item.name: Memorial Day Parade
